queries.query: SELECT [object_name], counter_name, instance_name, cntr_value AS [Value] FROM sys.dm_os_performance_counters WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ([object_name] LIKE N'%Buffer Node%' AND counter_name = N'Page life expectancy') OR ([object_name] LIKE N'%Memory Manager%' AND counter_name = N'Memory Grants Pending') OR (counter_name = N'Number of Deadlocks/sec')
